thread.title: Artist's Impression Of The Next 24 Hours For Congressional Democrats
thread.title_full: Artist's Impression Of The Next 24 Hours For Congressional Democrats

author: Tyler Durden
title: Artist's Impression Of The Next 24 Hours For Congressional Democrats
text:
logicalman Jan 19, 2017 5:28 PM 
I doubt 97% of climate scientists agree on much. 
Climate modelling is a hugely complex process - Edward Lorenz was an early pioneer of chaos theory (a branch of mathematics focused on the behavior of dynamical systems that are highly sensitive to initial conditions). His interest in chaos came about accidentally through his work on weather prediction in 1961. 
What's needed here is careful study devoid of vested interests, you know, REAL science that's not funded by those who would benefit from the outcome of their 'research'. 
The climate will change, so preparing for it would seem to be a good idea. Using it as an excuse for more taxes is complete bullshit.
